EmailTemplate.subject: Pilot’s Corner Avionics – Registration: Confirmation {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We appreciate your interest in The Pilot's Corner. Thank you for signing up to receive our quarterly newsletter, or to attend an upcoming webinar.
To better serve our customers, please visit the Global Data Center website to access technical and operational support, training courseware, and technical publications for aircraft and associated products.
Note: We have added a unique CASE and Reference number to this subject line above. Please ensure this information is included in the subject line in future correspondence or simply reply to this email and leave the unique Reference Case Number within the subject line to ensure prompt responses. This mailbox is monitored during normal business hours (MST).
Thank you for allowing us to serve your business needs.
Flight Technical Services
Customer & Product Support
Honeywell Aerospace
